nodes.text: Galactic Alliance Department of Public Protection

The Galactic Alliance Department of Public Protection was the department of the Galactic Federation of Free Alliances that supervised domestic security on the planet Coruscant. The department received information from the Coruscant Security Force.

Gefal Keb, a Gossam male, served as a senior civil servant within the department. He provided information to Admiral Cha Niathal that the Coruscant Security Force had given him regarding Colonel Jacen Solo and the Galactic Alliance Guard.
The Department of Public Protection first appeared in the novel Legacy of the Force: Sacrifice written by Karen Traviss and published on May 29, 2007.
